items.content_html: lagp-theme-manager is a lightweight library that provides an easy way to manage themes in your web applications. It can be used with React, Vue, or any other framework that supports the use of CDN. With lagp-theme-manager, you can load and apply themes, as well as listen to and emit events related to theme changes.
items.title: luispadre97/lapg-theme-manager: lagp-theme-manager is a lightweight library that provides an easy way to manage themes in your web applications. It can be used with React, Vue, or any other framework that supports the use of CDN. With lagp-theme-manager, you can load and apply themes, as well as listen to and emit events related to theme changes.

items.content_html: cancelable-promise-jq is a lightweight library that helps you manage and organize asynchronous callbacks in your JavaScript code. It provides a simple interface for registering and triggering callbacks, as well as managing their execution order.
